actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Research and Development

official_title: A bill to authorize the Department of Energy to initiate a cooperative research program in ocean energy and technology with the Pacific International Center for High Technology Research.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to establish a jointly funded cooperative research program in ocean energy and technology with the Pacific International Center for High Technology Research in Hawaii. Declares that the purpose of such program is to apply data design methods developed by the Department of Energy (and other international research organizations) to the development of a 200 kilowatt integrated open cycle ocean thermal energy conversion (OTEC) experimental system at the Natural Energy Laboratory of Hawaii. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1986 through 1990. Provides for such authorizations to be matched dollar for dollar by the State of Hawaii, the private sector, and other partners.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Department of Energy to initiate a cooperative research program in ocean energy and technology with the Pacific International Center for High Technology Research.
